name: Draw Shot
description: Hands at side. On timer beep, draw pistol and make one shot in IPSC A-Zone at 5 yards

name: El Prez
description: At 7 yards with back to three spaced targets.  On timer beep, turn and draw pistol and engage each target with two shots.  Then perform a slidelock reload and engage all three with two shots again.

name: Draw, shot, reload, shot
description: Hands at side. On timer beep, draw pistol and make one shot on A Zone and perform a slide lock reload and make a second shot on A zone.

name: Bill Drill
description: Hands at side.  On timer beep, draw pistol and engage the A zone with six shots.
